summary: The Case For Raising The Alcohol Tax

summary: $125 million gift from Microsoft co-founder launches new institute to probe immune system
title: $125 million gift from Microsoft co-founder launches new institute to probe immune system
description: Immunology is the latest field that will benefit from a hefty sum donated by Microsoft co-founder Paul Allen. The newly launched Allen Institute for Immunology, planned before the philanthropist died in October from complications of non-Hodgkin lymphoma, will attempt to better define what’s normal for the immune system and why it falters in cancer and autoimmune diseases. via Snapzu : Health & Body

reblog.comment: Immunology is the latest field that will benefit from a hefty sum donated by Microsoft co-founder Paul Allen. The newly launched Allen Institute for Immunology, planned before the philanthropist died in October from complications of non-Hodgkin lymphoma, will attempt to better define what’s normal for the immune system and why it falters in cancer and autoimmune diseases. via Snapzu : Health & Body

trail.content_raw: Immunology is the latest field that will benefit from a hefty sum donated by Microsoft co-founder Paul Allen. The newly launched Allen Institute for Immunology, planned before the philanthropist died in October from complications of non-Hodgkin lymphoma, will attempt to better define what’s normal for the immune system and why it falters in cancer and autoimmune diseases. via Snapzu : Health & Body
trail.content:
External image

Immunology is the latest field that will benefit from a hefty sum donated by Microsoft co-founder Paul Allen. The newly launched Allen Institute for Immunology, planned before the philanthropist died in October from complications of non-Hodgkin lymphoma, will attempt to better define what’s normal for the immune system and why it falters in cancer and autoimmune diseases. via Snapzu : Health & Body

summary: Autistic people listen to their hearts to test anti-anxiety therapy
title: Autistic people listen to their hearts to test anti-anxiety therapy

This article titled “Autistic people listen to their hearts to test anti-anxiety therapy” was written by Hannah Devlin Science correspondent, for theguardian.com on Friday 14th December 2018 18.00 Asia/Kolkata

A pioneering therapy aimed at lowering anxiety by tuning into your own heartbeat is being put to the test in the first clinical trial of its kind.

The treatment, known as…

summary: By robbing your bodies of salt, you not only reduce the amount of nutrients your lower GI is absorbing, you’re also preventing...
caption:
By robbing your bodies of salt, you not only reduce the amount of nutrients your lower GI is absorbing, you’re also preventing the body from breaking down certain acids that are dangerous to the rest of the body.” Read more here https://bit.ly/2OVI2RE

#health #keto #nevergiveup #justdoit

summary:
How to Become a Bodybuilding Champion - The Art of Bodybuilding!
  Yes, bodybuilding is an art! As the Potter molds the clay,...
caption:
How to Become a Bodybuilding Champion - The Art of Bodybuilding!

Yes, bodybuilding is an art! As the Potter molds the clay, so does the individual sculpt the body and mind. To the naked eye, most only see the exterior finish, to the champion; the art is in their history and in Rome. The sport of bodybuilding dates back to the Roman days of the gladiator….

summary:
Hey guys, wanna see a person panic?

Alright. So I need to pay off medical bills and rent and loans...
But my employer hasn't...
description:
Hey guys, wanna see a person panic?

Alright. So I need to pay off medical bills and rent and loans…
But my employer hasn’t paid me in a month and keeps shafting my concerns as “oh our bank must be struggling with adding your direct deposit” and other nonsense.
I’m desperate.
I can’t pay these bills. I can’t pay my rent. I’m already taking delivery service jobs just so I can buy food.
Please help. I don’t have any family I can turn to, their abusive butts finally kicked me out three years ago for finally standing up to their abuse.
Anything helps.
Please, I am so in the hole I could cry.

summary: With Exit in Sight, Congo’s Enigmatic Leader Is Leaving His Options Open
title: With Exit in Sight, Congo’s Enigmatic Leader Is Leaving His Options Open
body:
By KIMIKO de FREYTAS-TAMURA

Forced out by term limits after 17 years, President Joseph Kabila says he would accept an opposition victory in elections this month. But many expect he’ll return in five years.

Published: December 14, 2018 at 08:30AM

from NYT Africa https://ift.tt/2QtCK0u
via IFTTT

https://sumabon.com/collections/coffee/products/ceramic-mug-octopus-squirrel-hippo-and-shark

Every dollar goes towards me being able to provide more free information about #nutrition and #fitness and sharing the wealth of good #health.

blog.name: fitworlds
blog.title: Health & Fitness FANatic
blog.description: Fitness and Health Tips for Women Who Hate Diets

summary: Staying fit while travelling abroad via /r/Fitness
title: Staying fit while travelling abroad via /r/Fitness
body:
I’m going to be spending the next 7-8 months travelling (mostly through Asia) and I’m trying to put together a routine for while I’m gone. I will be mostly staying in hostels or volunteering, so I will have a fair amount of free time most days. I brought some resistance bands with me, and I have some experience doing body weight fitness workouts. Right now I have 3 questions: 1) have any of you implemented a workout regime while on a gap year, and what was your experience like? 2) does anyone know of any good resources for resistance band workouts? 3) does anyone know of any resources for looking into how to ensure a balanced diet while on a budget? I’m usually able to cook for myself which is good, but in the past I ran a lot more than I currently do (knees), and so I’m still in the habit of overloading on carbs

Thanks!



Submitted December 14, 2018 at 03:00AM by jcjc796
via reddit https://ift.tt/2CdxuFx

Welcome to my tumblr page!  I'm a Christian writer, covering various topics such as Christian living, self-help, recovery from abuse, animals and some fiction.  I welcome questions and suggestions for topics to cover.  
Please visit my website at: www.CynthiaBaileyRug.com for more information.

blog.name: crossfit-everlasting
blog.title: CrossFit Everlasting
blog.description:
CrossFit Everlasting has been a dream of mine ever since I found CrossFit. Being a member of a couple different boxes I learned a lot about what I liked and didn’t like.  I was fortunate enough to train with and be trained by some phenomenal coaches and athletes.  Those experiences were invaluable to my plans for CFE.
Our goal at CrossFit Everlasting is to help you achieve your goals.  We want to create a fun, teaching environment where your inner athlete can shine.  We look forward to and are equipped to train all ages and ability levels.  This is our “Barber Shop”, come hang out, join the crew and let’s do some work!
